<Text: Walt Disney Classics:  With the release of "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs", all the existing titles in the Classics line were replaced with the Masterpiece Collection line and the Classics line was canceled in the United States and Canada.>

Text: Walt Disney Classics:  Cassette copies of the original Classics series became much sought-after, and are very popular with collectors, since most retailers had the first home video release for Disney animated features in their stores up to the time when the label was discontinued.
